translated_poem:
Oh, how I want you
I don't know how to say
How much I desire you
It even begins to hurt, oh oh
 I'd give you the sun and the moon
Only to have you here
And to always be at your feet
Only you and me
No one around us
Only the blue sky
Only you and me
My heart and yours
 Oh oh oh, I just want to be with you
Oh oh oh, I just want to be with you
Oh oh oh, I just want to be with you
Oh oh oh, I just want to be with you
 Loving like I love you
May be prohibited
But I don't care
I only want to be with you oh oh
 I'd give you the sun and the moon
Only to have you here
And to always be at your feet
Only you and me
No one around us
Only the blue sky
Only you and me
My heart and yours
 Oh oh oh, I just want to be with you
Oh oh oh, I just want to be with you
Oh oh oh, I just want to be with you
Oh oh oh, I just want to be with you
 Oh oh oh, I just want to be with you
Oh oh oh, I just want to be with you
Oh oh oh, I just want to be with you
Oh oh oh, I just want to be with you

original_poem:
Reajo a esse incómodo olhar, nem quero acreditar
Que vem na minha direcção
Há dias que estou a reparar, nem queres disfarçar
Roubas a minha atenção
Aprecio o teu dom de tornar, num clique o meu falar
Numa total confusão
Confesso que só de imaginar, que te vou encontrar
Me sobe à boca o coração
E falas de ti, falas do tempo
Prolongas o momento. dum simples cumprimentar
Falas do dia, falas da noite
Nem sei que responda, perdido no teu olhar
É certo que sempre ouvi dizer, que do querer ao fazer
Vai um enorme esticão
Mas haverá quem possa negar, que querer é poder
E o nunca é uma invenção
Bem sei que este nosso cruzar, pode até nem passar
Dum capricho sem valor
Mas porque raio hei-de evitar, se esse teu ar
Me trouxe ao sangue calor
E falas de ti, falas do tempo
Prolongas o momento. dum simples cumprimentar
Falas do dia, falas da noite
Nem sei que responda
E falas de ti, falas do tempo
Prolongas o momento. dum simples cumprimentar
Falas do dia, falas da noite
Nem sei que responda, perdido no teu olhar
translated_poem:
I react to that uncomfortable look, I don't even want to believe
That it comes towards me
I've been noticing it for days, you don't even try to disguise it
You steal my attention
I appreciate your gift of making, in a click, what I'm telling you
Into a total confusion
I confess that only from imagining that I'll meet you
My heart goes straight to my mouth
And it talks about you, talks about time
Extends a moment, from a simple greeting
It talks about the day, talks about the night
I don't even know what to answer, I'm lost in your eyes
It's true that I've always heard them say, that going from wanting to doing
Is an enormous stretch
But there can be someone who can deny it, that wanting is power
And the never is an invention
I know well that us crossing, may even not be more
Than a worthless whim
But because I'm going to avoid the lightning, if this air of yours
Has brought me to the warm blood
And it talks about you, talks about time
Extends a moment, from a simple greeting
It talks about the day, talks about the night
I don't even know what to answer
And it talks about you, talks about time
Extends a moment, from a simple greeting
It talks about the day, talks about the night
I don't even know what to answer, I'm lost in your eyes

E que não importa se ignoras, sei que pensas em mim
Sei que não demora a hora de te ver despir
A vida só tem dois dias e eu só tenho uma noite pra ti
 Tu não procuras amor
Eu tenho algo melhor
A vida só tem dois dias e eu só tenho uma noite pra ti
Nah nah eh
Nah nah eh
Nah nah eh
Nah nah eh
Nah nah eh
 Toda a gente sabe desse teu dom dom

Eu não suporto ver-te fugir
Chega um pouco mais perto com este som
Eu e tu na prática só pode ser bom
Por isso anda mulher a vida não se perde, só nos perdemos os dois
 Sabes que és gostosa e és perigosa
E que não importa se ignoras sei que pensas em mim
Sei que não demora a hora de te ver despir
A vida só tem dois dias e eu só tenho uma noite pra ti
 Tu não procuras amor
Eu tenho algo melhor

A vida só tem dois dias e eu só tenho uma noite pra ti
Tu não procuras amor
Eu tenho algo melhor

translated_poem:
I know that nothing makes you glance at me
Even if I try to get closer to you
I do everything for you to notice me here
But I don't realize that you're like that
You know that you're hot even though you deny it
And that you don't care if you ignore me, I know that you think of me
I know that it wont be long before i see you undressed
Life only has two days, and I have only one night for you
 You don't look for love
I have something much better
Life only has two days, and I have only one night for you

 Everyone knows about your gift gift

I can't handle you running away
Come a bit closer to this sound

That's why, come on woman, life doesn't lose itself, we only lose ourselves
 You know that you're hot and dangerous

 You don't look for love

 You know that you're hot even though you deny it

original_poem:
Planeta Incrível e bom para morar
Viajei o espaço e não dá pra comparar
A Terra é fofa, é meu estilo
Acho que vou ficar aqui um tempo
Nesse planeta posso ter amigos e
Pegar muitos monstros, nada vai me impedir
Acho que vou chamar a Terra de meu lar
translated_poem:
Incredible and good planet to live in
I traveled the space and you can't compare
Earth is cute, it's my style
I think I'll stay here for a while
On this planet I can have friends and
Catch lots of monsters, nothing will stop me
I think I'll call Earth my home

original_poem:
Lutar e brilhar, como um guerreiro!
E voar, persistir!
Superar qualquer barreira!
Encarar sem temor, seu destino
E será o vencedor
Com a luz que te guiar
Os perigos enfrentar
O seu cosmo elevar
E a vitória irá chegar
Com o amanhã!
Saint Seiya!
O coração que pode alcançar
A chama que acende a esperança
Saint Seiya!
As suas asas no céu vão abrir
E os corações novamente irão sorrir!
translated_poem:
Fight and shine, like a warrior
And fly, persist!
Overcome any barrier!
Face without fear, your destiny
And you'll be the winner
With the light that guides you
The dangers to face
And uplift your cosmos
And the victory will come
With the tomorrow!
Saint Seiya!
The heart that can reach
The flame that ignites the hope
Saint Seiya!
Your wings will spread in the sky
And the hearts will smile again!
